ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] D2 Kakis List
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually the server is up all the time.  The only time it s down is when u can t even login to Bnet.  If u can login to Bnet but unable to create a game (with
ygData.messageBody:
Actually the server is up all the time. The only time it's down is when u
can't even login to Bnet. If u can login to Bnet but unable to create a
game (with msg server is down), tat's becoz Blizzard has come out with a
temp soln to limit the number of games payable in server. So if u wanna
play, u can either join any existing games (prvided game not full), or keep
trying to create game.

Tat's why I say it's better for a few of us to try creating games at one
time. Once a game is created, the other kakis just join in (with pw of
coz). Somemore I think D2 xp still very good even grping. Blizzard is now
trying to solve the latency prob, hope they can get the server work
properly asap.

Btw u play EQ during weekend meh? Twink ah? Dun see ya name ard...

On Monday, 10 July, 2000 2:56 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...] wrote:
> I have all but given up trying to get into a game or create one. I think
i
> can better spend the time playing Open or TCP/IP or other stuff. The k
orean
> server over the weekend is just plain STUPID.the server is always down :P
>
> Sorry , weekend is preious time to waste. i play EQ better. :(
>
> BiBi
>
